attributes.action: Have a Rejoin EU referendum in 2020
attributes.additional_details:
This is necessary because the majority of UK citizens want to rejoin the EU and because it is best for Britain. We will avoid crashing the economy, losing jobs and splitting the UK.

The UK is so dependent on the EU that it is best for our beloved country to be part of it and driver our success from within.
attributes.background: If the petition reaches 100,000 signature Parliament should allow a new referendum in 2020 asking to rejoin the EU.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300026
